import { useParams } from "react-router-dom"; import SearchResult from "./searchresult"; const Search = () => { const {name} = useParams(); const {data:searchResult, isPending, error, setUrl} = useFecth('https://api.themoviedb.org/3/search/movie?api_key=05b670c12d1973fe82919a005ef06481&query='+name) return (
{searchResult && searchResult.results.filter(element => element.poster_path!=null && element.title!=null && element.overview!=null).map((res)=>

{res.title}

{res.vote_average} {res.vote_count/1000}k votes
{res.overview}
)}
); } export default Search;
